item.description:
Ankur won a VIP party for 50 at the Pour House. He has kindly invited our meetup members. Come and meet other meetup members in a relaxed setting.

The party coincides with their Tuesday night September and October promotion: FEST WITH THE BEST (The Pour House and Sam Adams Octoberfest) Starting at 6pm the downstairs bar is transformed into a VIP lounge (open to 21+ guests only). There will be a delicious buffet of hot dogs and sausages (complete with spicy mustard, sauerkrat, onions), pretzels and dip, vegetable crudite and homemade apple streudel from 6-8pm, refilling it on a need-to basis. They will also will have Octoberfest trivia to win giftcards, will include the following:

  • A roped off area for your group
  • Access to the complimentary buffet
  • Chances to win Pour House gift cards

 *As always update you RSVP if your plans change.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: After work - VIP party
